#include<iostream>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;

void reversechar(char a[])
{
	int i=0;
	int j=strlen(a)-1;
	
	while(i<j)
	{
		a[i]=a[i]+a[j]-(a[j]=a[i]);
		i++;
		j--;
	}
}

int main(void)
{
	char a[100], b[100];
	int mx, temp1, temp2, carry;
	int count, i;
	
	while(1)
	{
		memset(a, 0, sizeof(a));
		memset(b, 0, sizeof(b));
		count=0;
		
		scanf("%s %s",a, b);
		
		if(strcmp(a, "0") == 0)
		{
			if(strcmp(b, "0") == 0)
			{
				break;
			}
		}
		
		reversechar(a);
		reversechar(b);
		
		mx=strlen(a)>strlen(b)?strlen(a) : strlen(b);
		
		carry=0;
		
		for(i=0; i<mx; i++)
		{
			temp1=a[i]-'0';
			temp2=b[i]-'0';
			
			if(temp1<0)
			{
				temp1=0;
			}
			if(temp2<0)
			{
				temp2=0;
			}
			
			temp1=temp1+temp2+carry;
			
			if(temp1>9)
			{
				carry=1;
				count++;
			}
			else
			{
				carry=0;
			}
		}
		
		if(count==0)
		{
			printf("No carry operation.\n");
		}
		else if(count==1)
		{
			printf("%d carry operation.\n", count);
		}
		else
		{
			printf("%d carry operations.\n",count);
		}
	}
	
	return 0;
}
